text: @nethmmi agreed. Not all manly men are rapists. Gillette suggest we are. The broad stroke approach is not acceptable. Not all women are home wrecking cheaters,some are. Not all women are murderers, some are. I'm not going to suggest that all women are home wrecking murderers just because some are. The campaign suggests we are all at fault, this is not the case. Its causes people to jump on board to feel part of the revolution without engaging their brain.

@nethmmi not at all. You are part of the problem. When you want a cows head chopped off and it guts ripped out so you can have a hamburger or you need to send soldiers off to war to fight for your right to have an opinion,just like I can. When you need the trees cut down around your house, when you decide to make babies,  you need a strong confident person with certain skills and abilities. This person is more often than not a masculine man doing what he does best. My wife loves it when I grab her ass and tell her (without asking first!!) that she is sexy or whistle at her. If my son gets provoked I have taught him to stand up and fight back so he too can become a strong male influence when his time comes. He knows right from wrong. He respects all people from all backgrounds. Get the fuck off your high horse. Accept the fact you will most likely die alone due to your retarded thought process and learn to gut your own food after shooting it in the face.
Toxic masculinity is toxic. Not masculinity itself. When did you get lost in this ad?
I’ll make sure I check if #proctorandgamble own or a parent company of any product I consider purchasing and if they are I’ll find an alternative #boycottproctorandgamble #stopfeminizationofmen
